% Test input file for checking index generation.
% Do not make gratuitous changes here as the text is checked by the
% test script 14-makeindex.t.

\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{makeidx}
\makeindex
\date{20 September 2007}
\author{A.N. Other}
\title{Simple Test Document 14}
\begin{document}
\maketitle

This is a test document that def{}ines an index term.
\index{xyzzy}
\printindex
\end{document}
